channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Celebrate books publshed by my wife Tina Kuo.

item.title: 暗號偵探社
item.description: This is Tina’s first foray into young adults long fiction.

item.title: 丁小飛校園日記2：誰是最佳小隊長？
item.description: This book reminded me of my own struggles in Third Grade, where reputation and power goes hand-in-hand. I tried my best to un-seat the 班長 by beating her on tests, but she always pulled one over me..

item.title: 丁小飛校園日記4：聰明眼鏡
item.description: This is the first book that I managed to contribute to one of Tina’s books. It so happend that I was really drolling over what people were saying about Google Glass at the time. So when Tina asked me about a cool tech toy for Fei, it had to be some kind of Glass gizmo!

item.title: 丁小飛校園日記3：副班長爭奪戰
item.description: My favorite book of the series! Especially the part about falling in the “Dumb Dumb Hole”…
